text: I’ve gone through and updated all Dx screens based on feedback and direction from the last two days. Check it here: <https://drive.google.com/open?id=0B1KFvQr_SwVvQk56cnlGRHZhazA>
I’ll copy them over to the final folder once i get approval on them

More updates:

• Adjustments to downloading screen: removed “downloading” button ghost state, updated progress bar buttons (no more pause/play for downloads)
• Added check mark icon to “Completed” session cards in library dx list and removed extra differentiators making played session cards identical to unplayed/uncompleted

<https://drive.google.com/open?id=0B1KFvQr_SwVvSEppd19BMEdCN0U>

<!channel> just talking more about adding activity UX in here and we’re not showing the location on the add activity screens anymore - it’s going to show only recently logged added activities (think i get this, but not 100% sure). this removed the need for a full screen progress indicator that they said was needed in our design meeting
<@U02AUNA0P>: since you designed these screens, can you connect with <@U0HP6TFNX> on this front and make sure you understand the details that are changing?
